column4: can someone help me setup voice settings in skype in ubuntu 9.04
can someone help me setup voice settings in skype in ubuntu 9.04?
you would basically have to go to options, ctrl+o, then sound devices or so.
i ve tried but cant make out much
what I do there, is I set the sound in to the first thing, and the sound out and ringing to pulse.
what I do there, is I set the sound in to the first thing, and the sound out and ringing to pulse. Then make a test call.
ya, it seems to do the trick.
i tried the test call, but it says  problem with audio capture
Heh, I thought you said it worked. Anyway, then change the sound in to the next option
if you can hear the thing, then it is the sound in.
Great, good job on taking the initiative :)
